name: test_e2e_with_logs[047_SQLI_ERROR_009]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_009` |
| **Name** | POLYGON geometry error injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND POLYGON((SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables)x)) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20POLYGON%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%29x%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 07:08:12.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_009-1768201692369-lvoa pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_009 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20POLYGON%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
